channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Gradient’s heat pumps get new smarts to enable old building retrofits
item.description: Gradient's heat pumps fit in windows, minimizing installation times. Now, it is introducing software to make those units more intelligent.

item.title: The tiny-but-mighty Minisforum MS-01 is a "small form factor dream" that tackles big workloads — and it's just $775 for a limited time
item.description: Minisforum MS-01 mini PC is powered by Intel’s Core i5-12600H, with 32GB of DDR5 memory and a 1TB SSD, and is currently priced at just $775 at Newegg.

item.title: Is Lead Exposure Really Declining? A Century of Hair Holds the Answer
item.description: Before the agency, lead levels were shockingly higher.

item.title: Sony's WH-1000XM6 headphones are down to a record-low price
item.description:
Sony's wireless WH-1000XM6 headphones are on sale for $398 via Amazon. This is a record-low price, as it drops $62 from the price tag. The sale applies to all three colorways. These easily topped our list of the best wireless headphones. They are, in a word, fantastic. The headphones are packed with premium features, like advanced ANC. There are a whopping 12 ANC microphones throughout and a brand-new chip to power the feature. The end result? It successfully blocks background noise at medium and high frequencies, including the human voice.
The sound quality is extremely pleasing to the ear...

item.title: Watch Club is producing short video dramas and building a social network around them
item.description: Watch Club will house microdramas and fan discussions in the same app, creating a fandom-focused social media experience.

item.title: Republicans Are All in on Boosting Fraud Allegations in California
item.description: Right-wing influencers who were instrumental in spreading allegations of fraud in Minnesota ahead of ICE's surge are now going after a number of California’s social welfare programs.

item.title: No, Ubisoft did actually announce The Division: Definitive Edition but no one saw it, and it's not a remake or remaster like fans expected
item.description: Ubisoft has released Tom Clancy's The Division: Definitive Edition for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC, after advertisements for the game leaked last month.

item.title: Fitbit founders launch Luffu, a way to integrate your family's health data
item.description: Fitbit's founders have a new startup. Two years after leaving Google, James Park and Eric Friedman announced a new platform that shifts the focus from the individual to the family. They say the Luffu mobile app "uses AI quietly in the background" to collect and organize family health information."At Fitbit, we focused on personal health — but after Fitbit, health for me became bigger than just thinking about myself," Park said in a press release. The app is particularly focused on the "CEO of the family" — the person who manages appointments, prescriptions and other health-related tasks.But t...

item.title: L’élégance du MacBook Air M4 13″ à portée de main grâce à cette réduction de 265 € pour une durée très limitée
item.description: L'ultraportable emblématique d'Apple est sur le devant de la scène avec sa puce M4 capable de gérer le multitâche à retrouver pour 934 euros sur Cdiscount au lieu de 1199 euros.

item.description: A Sea of Remnants developer talks about the upcoming game's monetization systems and promises that they will be fair.

item.title: Russian hackers are targeting a new Office 365 zero-day, so patch now or face attack
item.description: Ukraine's defenders have spotted a new hacking attack using a freshly fixed Office flaw.

item.description: Les représentants de Solidaires Informatique ont exprimé clairement leur souhait de voir le patron d'Ubisoft quitter ses fonctions.

item.title: Lotus Health nabs $35M for AI doctor that sees patients for free
item.description: This AI doctor is licensed in all 50 states, the startup says. The deal was led by CRV and Kleiner Perkins.

item.title: Le bug du Patch Tuesday qui empêche certains PC Windows 11 de s’éteindre se propage à Windows 10
item.description: La première mise à jour de l’année de Windows a créé des problèmes en cascade chez les utilisateurs. Après avoir touché principalement les machines sous Windows 11, le bug qui empêche les machines de s’éteindre s’étend à présent aux PC sous Windows 10.

item.title: 3 things you need to know before giving financial gifts

Gifting logistics Unless you’re writing a check from your bank account, the logistics of gifting funds can get a bit complicated. If you want to gift from your IRA, your only option is to sell a […] If you have gifting to loved ones on your mind, here are some considerations related to taxes and logistics....

item.title: French police raid X’s Paris office as UK investigation continues
item.description: A raid on X's Paris office was carried out by the Paris prosecutor's cybercrime unit on Tuesday with Europol and French police as part of an ongoing investigation that expanded in July to include Grok. As previously reported by Reuters, Elon Musk and former X CEO Linda Yaccarino were also summoned for hearings in April. […]

item.title: Google voudrait en finir avec ChromeOS en 2034
item.description: La fusion d'Android et de Chrome OS pour les PC n'est pas près d'arriver. Des documents de justice montrent que Google compte prendre son temps avant de lancer « Aluminium OS », le nom de code de ce projet.

item.title: The best gifts for coffee lovers in 2026
item.description:
When it comes to making a great cup at home, us coffee nerds are constantly learning and love to try new things. Whether the person you’re shopping for is a newly indoctrinated pour over lover or obsessive over every brewing parameter, we’ve compiled a list of the best gear for coffee geeks that you can get. Spanning brewing, grinding and, of course, drinking, we’ve got a range of options that can help the java geek in your life expand their at-home setup or just try something new. And for the person that already has it all, we’ve got something for them too. Best gifts for coffee lovers
...

item.title: Comment faire un partage de connexion sur un smartphone Android ou iPhone ?
item.description: Un problème de Wi-Fi pour vous connecter depuis votre ordinateur ? Pas de souci, vous pouvez partager votre connexion 4G ou 5G depuis votre smartphone et le transformer en hotspot Wi-Fi (ou point d'accès Wi-Fi en français) pour vous connecter depuis n'importe où.

item.title: The Switch is Nintendo’s best-selling console — and its most transformative
item.description: Nintendo has had plenty of highs over its few decades in the video game industry. Popularizing home consoles with the NES, introducing new audiences to games through the Wii's motion controls, and the touchscreen Trojan horse that was the Nintendo DS, to name a few. But often these successes were followed by missteps; the Wii […]

item.description: All the ways to watch free streams of Arsenal vs Chelsea from anywhere in the world in this Carabao Cup 25-26 semi-final second leg.

item.title: How much do VPNs cost?
item.description: So you've decided you need a virtual private network to hide your browsing activity from your ISP, change your virtual location, stay safe on public Wi-Fi and enjoy all the other benefits. The inevitable next question is: "Should I pay for one? If so, how much?"All the best VPNs cost money, but it can be hard to tell an overpriced service apart from one that's priced according to its value. On this page, I'll share the costs for top VPN services, calculate the industry average and explain what makes VPNs cost as much as they do. At the end, I'll share a few tips for making a VPN fit your budge...

item.title: Databricks' serverless database slashes app development from months to days as companies prep for agentic AI
item.description: Five years ago, Databricks coined the term 'data lakehouse' to describe a new type of data architecture that combines a data lake with a data warehouse. That term and data architecture are now commonplace across the data industry for analytics workloads.Now, Databricks is once again looking to create a new category with its Lakebase service, now generally available today. While the data lakehouse construct deals with OLAP (online analytical processing) databases, Lakebase is all about OLTP (online transaction processing) and operational databases. The Lakebase service has been in development s...

item.title: Everyone on TikTok is ‘regulating their nervous system’
item.description: What this even means—and how you can do it on your own to reduce anxiety. “Me everyday bc my nervous system doesn’t know the difference between a busy day at work or being attacked by a tiger,” a TikTok post reads.

item.title: Even Dell can't escape RAM crisis price hikes — but I've found 5 laptop deals that can save you up to $650 on top-rated devices
item.description: The RAM and storage crisis is causing price hikes across the industry, but if you're shopping for a laptop today, you can still save up to $650 with these 5 best deals I've found in the Dell Tech Days sale.

item.description: The Paris prosecutor’s office announced that it is expanding a criminal investigation into X for alleged crimes, including the possession and distribution of child sexual exploitation material.

item.title: Tesla lance ses nouveaux panneaux solaires qui peuvent produire de l’électricité même à l’ombre (ou presque)
item.description: Le géant américain Tesla présente une nouvelle série de panneaux solaires destinés aux particuliers. Ces modèles sont optimisés pour une installation plus simple et une production solaire plus efficace.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : voici les ultimes offres à saisir pour ce dernier jour de promotions
item.description: Il ne faut pas se le cacher, la dernière démarque des soldes est souvent le moment où l'on trouve les meilleures offres, car les e-commerçants comme Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Boulanger veulent écouler les derniers stocks. Et c'est encore plus le cas pendant le dernier jour de l'événement...

item.title: Les emplois occupés par les femmes plus exposés à l’intelligence artificielle
item.description: Les emplois souvent occupés par des femmes et par des travailleurs qui ont une formation universitaire sont plus exposés à l’intelligence artificielle que d’autres, indique mardi l’Institut de la statistique du Québec.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs SSD M.2 internes (ou externe) pour votre PlayStation 5 en 2026 ?
item.description: Plus de place pour les jeux sur votre PlayStation 5 ou PS5 Pro toute neuve ? Ajoutez-lui donc un SSD interne NVMe ou un disque SSD externe pour ne plus jamais avoir à supprimer de titres. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles.

item.description: J'ai visité la première usine européenne de Porsche qui produit les batteries du nouveau Cayenne électrique. Une plongée dans un univers ultra robotisé et impressionnant, clairsemé de déceptions qui prouvent le retard pris par l'Europe sur l'Asie dans le domaine.

item.title: How to keep your Minecraft server safe and secure
item.description: Running your own Minecraft server is very satisfying but does incur some risk. Here's how to minimize that risk and run a successful server.

item.title: AMD FSR Redstone : pourquoi la nouvelle itération du FSR va changer la vie des joueurs équipés en AMD [Sponso]
item.description: Déployé en fin d’année dernière, le FSR Redstone, la technologie software made in AMD pour améliorer la qualité visuelle des jeux vidéo, est une petite révolution. Pourquoi ? Parce que le constructeur a revu sa conception du FSR de A à Z en travaillant sur une suite de fonctionnalités reposant sur l’IA pour booster les performances de ses GPU.

item.title: Microsoft is killing off some popular standalone OneDrive and SharePoint plans because they aren't profitable enough
item.description: Microsoft says low customer demand and "unintended or nonstandard usage" caused it to pull the plug on these OneDrive/SharePoint plans.

item.title: Disney announces Josh D’Amaro will be its new CEO after Iger departs
item.description: Stop me if you've heard this one before. Disney has announced a successor to outgoing CEO Bob Iger, effective in March. Josh D’Amaro, current chairman of Disney Experiences, was tapped for the role in a unanimous vote by the company's board of directors. D’Amaro has been at Disney for 28 years, where he oversaw theme parks, cruises and consumer products including video games. The company had previously appointed Bob Chapek, the Disney Parks chairman at the time, as successor to Bob Iger in 2020. At the time, Iger had served as CEO since 2005. But Chapek only lasted until 2022, when Bob Iger re...

item.title: February’s Xbox Game Pass additions include High on Life 2, Madden NFL 26 and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
item.description: Microsoft has revealed the first wave of Xbox Game Pass additions for February, and it feels like there's a bit of something for everyone this time around. Two of the titles land on the service today across the Game Pass Ultimate, Premium and PC Game Pass tiers: Final Fantasy II (cloud, Xbox Series X/S and PC) and Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii (cloud, console, handheld and PC). Final Fantasy II is a "remodeled 2D take" on the classic 1988 RPG, while Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii is a wild-looking spin-off of the main Like a Dragon series with pirates and naval combat.Madden NFL 26 is hittin...

item.title: Claude Code was down, forcing developers to take a long coffee break
item.description: Anthropic's Claude AI models experienced a major outage today, impacting products like Claude Code. Developers were seeing a 500 error when trying to use Claude Code, and Anthropic said that it was seeing elevated error rates on its APIs "across all Claude models." Anthropic quickly identified the root cause and implemented a fix within around […]

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2026: Everything we're expecting from the S26 launch
item.description: Samsung’s 2025 was filled with new foldables, an ultra-thin new form factor and the launch of Google's XR platform. After making some announcements at CES 2026, the company is expected to host its first Galaxy Unpacked of the year in February to introduce the Galaxy S26 lineup. Official invites have yet to be shared, but the date is widely expected to be near the end of the month.Whenever it does happen, Engadget will be covering Galaxy Unpacked live, and we'll most likely have hands-on coverage of Samsung's new smartphones soon after they're announced. While we wait for an official invite, he...

item.title: The Dyson PencilVac is finally available and costs $600
item.description:
The Dyson PencilVac stick vacuum is finally available for purchase in the US after being revealed . It costs $600. The company says this is the "world's slimmest vacuum cleaner." We haven't broken out any rulers to confirm that statement, but it's certainly a ridiculously thin stick vac. It achieves this thinness by using a motor inspired by the company's . This is a small motor that can actually rest in the shaft, so there's not a noticeable bulge where the components have been placed. This stick vacuum is actually, well, a stick. Just take a look at it.
A vacuum being emptied.
Dyso...

item.title: I didn’t expect to love Dyson’s PencilVac Fluffycones – but I did
item.description: As The Verge's resident robot vacuum reviewer, I don't have a lot of time (or space) in my life for stick vacs, and frankly, the ones I have used have largely disappointed me. Top-heavy, bulky, always getting clogged or running out of battery - they're so… manual. But then I met PencilVac Fluffycones, Dyson's new […]

item.title: MSI Prestige 14 Flip AI+ review: An ultraportable for Arc Raiders, thanks to Intel's Panther Lake
item.description:
MSI Prestige 14 Flip AI+ is a surprisingly powerful ultraportable held back by a clunky trackpad. It's a shame, really, because it's very well-designed and thanks to Intel’s Panther Lake CPU, it can even run games like Arc Raiders without breaking a sweat. It also has more ports than most thin and light machines, its OLED screen is great for productivity work and at three pounds it's easy to carry around all day. But curse its mechanical trackpad — why does it even exist when Apple, Microsoft and others have been able to implement excellent haptic touchpads for years? Come on now.
Hardware W...
